name: Super-Hero Mad City Stories
description:
Welcome back to the mad city open world environment game where you can choose multiple superhero costumes with superhuman abilities. Use hook wire to stick and climb any building and skyscraper across the city.

Fighting Missions:
Show some real fighting moves and fight city gangster, snow monster, and orcs in the castle. The fun never stops in this coolest action-packed fighting missions.

Simulate your world:
Get in the cop's cars, garbage trucks,s or ambulance and play the coolest simulation mission across an open-world environment like never before. Pick and drop cops, transport injured civilians to the city hospital, and keep the city clean with a garbage truck. Fly army helicopter or drive army tanks enjoy the best open-world simulation game for FREE.

Rescue missions:
A building on fire or car crash in a tree help out the fellow citizens as real superhero and jump, fly or run to the location. Transport injured persons to the nearest city hospital in amazing rescuer missions.

Free Mode:
Not in mode to play any mission? Roam free across city grab or steal any car, bikes, bicycle and hoverboard fight any civilian and people across town the fun never stops. Enjoy hours of gameplay at one place like never before.
